title: Push up extraction success rate (currently 98.7%)
description:
67/5280 URLs (1.3%) fail extraction. Improved from 98.5% via URL filter improvements (PR pending). Remaining failures break down as:

- sprinklebakes.com: 18/92 (80.4%) - Blogspot hosted, no structured data
- smittenkitchen.com: 18/982 (98.2%) - Old posts (2007-2016) without recipe plugin
- food.com: 3/27 (88.9%) - JS-rendered pages
- ohmyveggies.com: 3/6 (50%) - Broken/migrated pages
- mybakingaddiction.com: 3/97 (96.9%) - Empty recipeIngredient in JSON-LD
- momontimeout.com: 3/100 (97%) - 2 missing ingredients, 1 missing instructions
- Various single failures across 12 other sites

Next steps: investigate sprinklebakes Blogspot extraction (biggest opportunity), consider site-specific fixes for food.com/mybakingaddiction.
